subject: Horse Racing
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Since 1992, a Belmont Stakes with a horse seeking the Triple Crown has drawn an average of 13.5 million viewers. When it’s an ordinary race, that figure plummets to 5.9 million.
snippet: Since 1992, a Belmont Stakes with a horse seeking the Triple Crown has drawn an average of 13.5 million viewers. When it’s an ordinary race, that figure plummets to 5.9 million.
